projects.name: AI-Trip-Planner
projects.description: Developed a website using Python's Stream lit library and hosted on Streamlit app. This website assists users in planning trips, finding hotels and restaurants, and providing weather forecasts for specific locations. The information is fetched using Google's Gemini API key and API key is Loaded using Dotenv library.
